title: Ep. 661 Conservative Voices Are Being Silenced
description:
In this episode I address the continued attacks on conservative voices and the efforts to suppress honest political debate. I also discuss some positive news about the economy that you may not be hearing about. 
 
The hysteria to label everyone Russian “bots” may lead to liberals as well. 
Was Michael Moore “colluding” with the Russians? 
Was Barack Obama a “deficit cutter”?
Are we looking at strong economic growth ahead? Read this brief piece. 
A Trump bump in approval ratings? Absolutely. 
Why the war on guns has failed. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
